info.title: Name Generation API
info.description: Fungenerators name generation API generates random names relevant to the given category. Lots of categories are supported with many variations supported. [Click here to subscribe](http://fungenerators.com/api/namegen/)

get.description: Generated names in the given category

parameters.name: suggest
parameters.description: Suggestion string if supported by this category generator.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: start. Controls pagination. Relevant only if suggestion is supported

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit. Controls pagination limit. Relevant only if suggestion is supported
